oai_dc:dc.dc:title: French. Lizzie Crozier French Scrapbook, p. 47 a
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Lizzie Crozier French Scrapbook, p. 47 a. Newspaper clipping: Registration Closes With 16, 458 Citizens Qualified For Ballot. [Journal and Tribune].
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Politics & government; Clippings; Scrapbooks; Women; Voter registration;
oai_dc:dc.dc:source: C.M. McClung Historical Collection, Knox County Public Library
oai_dc:dc.dc:rights: For information on license and use fees and acquiring high-resolution image files, contact DigitalCollections@knoxlib.org or phone 865 215-8814. Please provide a brief description of the material.
oai_dc:dc.dc:description:
Registration Closes With 16,458 Citizens Qualified For Ballot Canvass of all registration places by Journal and Tribune reporters at closing hour last night showed the following final figures, giving the total number qualified in each ward and the number of women included:
Wards— Total Registered Number of Women First 604 165 Second 407 180 Third 343 83 Fourth 303 128 Fifth 568 92 Sixth 473 180 Seventh, North 787 298 Seventh, South 456 76 Eighth 449 78 Ninth, North . . 714 199 Ninth, South . . 500 118 Tenth, North . . 839 303 Tenth, South . . 840 245 Eleventh, East 848 305 E!eventh, West 1200 394 Twelfth 385 90 Thirteenth 382 67 Fourteenth 1011 248 Fifteen 1105 355 Sixteenth ..... 559 153 Seventeenth . . . 682 133 Eighteenth 320 76 Nineteenth 507 103 Twentieth East 160 6 Twentieth, West 152 23 Twenty-first . . 302 35 Twenty-second 235 30 Twenty-third 176 31 Twenty-fourth 296 43 Twenty-fifth, North 341 96 Twenty-fifth, South 171 35 Twenty-sixth 804 241 TOTAL 16, 458 4528
